snippet: Tablets and smartphones can be an easy way for children to learn the fun of playing musical instruments.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights tablet and smartphone apps for children to learn the fun of playing musical instruments.
lead_paragraph: Tablets and smartphones can be an easy way for children to learn the fun of playing musical instruments.

headline.print_headline: The Young Person’s Guide to the (Smartphone) Orchestra
headline.seo: Go Go Xylo, Meet the Orchestra and Other Music Apps for Children
headline.main: The Young Person’s Guide to the (Smartphone) Orchestra
